text: This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and share information when you use SalesGRID.
Like any other website, SalesGRID uses 'cookies'.
We use the information we collect in various ways, including to:

They automatically receive your IP address when this occurs.
Third-party ad servers or ad networks uses technologies like cookies, JavaScript, or Web Beacons that are used in their respective advertisements and links that appear on SalesGRID, which are sent directly to users' browser.
We use this metadata to classify files and offer relevant recommendations through our AI assistant, Savvy.
